title: Needing to know the font used by Michael's, Red Hat Society, and Fantastic Sam's (see image)
author: killergraphicsusa

comments.content: This slanted roman is likely a customized or pre-digital version of [ITC Bookman](http://web.archive.org/web/20150405123424/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/itc_bookman_std_medium/?sample_text=Fantastic%20Sams&acs_ss=8), but the digital OpenType version does include swashes. See the character set below.
